extendedInfo.description: Who is driving that car? Oh my God, a Bear is Driving! How can that Be?!* Grab stuff with your finger.* Eat Fish and Berries.* When you are FAT enough, drive into a cave to Hibernate.* You can throw stuff out the windows and sunroof!"It is, quite simply, the best Bear-based driving sim of all time" - rockpapershotgun"Enviro-Bear 2010 is a game made by crazy people ... practically impossible to get to wherever you want to go"- SlideToPlay.com"The driving controls provide as realistic of an experience as I can imagine if I were a bear driving a car"- TouchArcade.com

reviews.title: Great port of a hilarious game
reviews.comment: I love how I start this up and for about 30 seconds I think \'hey I\'m doing pretty good so far\' and then I remember I am a bear and bears cannot drive (very well) and then the car fills up with boulders.
reviews.author: boardergw

reviews.title: Simply the best simulator of its kind
reviews.comment: The rendering of the woods makes you swear you can smell the pine trees. The most realistic bear-driving I\'ve seen in ages with snow that seems cold to the touch. BE the bear and feel the rush of the engine as you deftly navigate for food.
reviews.author: John Escobedo

reviews.title: Nick
reviews.comment: With no trace of doubt, the best bear driving simulation ever. Good bear skin texture, brilliant bear dynamics, accurate bear psycology, and realistic winter arrival. A must have for anyone into serious simulation!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The essential Bear Driving sim!
reviews.comment: Bear driving is underrated and overlooked in todays entertainment market. Captain Games has filled this hole with the best game ever made! Feel the breeze in your fur, taste the berries and salmon. Plays exactly like the PC game, with an added visual mode. Just find a mushroom...
reviews.author: Michael Starkey

reviews.title: Better than any other bear driving simulator.
reviews.comment: Best on the market today. 10/10 would pay 99 cents again to watch another bear driving another car run into me while being distracted by the fish flying into his vehicle while trying to operate a motor vehicle.
reviews.author: Justin Bakelaar

reviews.title: So absurdly fun
reviews.comment: Hehe this is so adopting for whatever reason... I love it!!  Only thing I wish there was is some kind of meter  to tell you how hard you are steering... It\'s so easy to oversteer and get jammed haha I guess it\'s part of the game
reviews.author: Mauricio Chaves

reviews.title: The most realistic bear driving simulator.
reviews.comment: Sometime last Thursday, I sat on the couch wondering what it\'d be like to be a bear driving a Volkswagen Rabbit. And now I have the most advanced sim
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too easy to quite
reviews.comment: Add a quit confirmation to the centre of the screen. I just need to brush part of the surface of my phone to accidentally quit. Otherwise excellent.
reviews.author: Lea Tapmicha

reviews.title: CRAZY FUN
reviews.comment: Thank you TotalBiscuit, best 30minutes of side splitting hilarity I\'ve experienced in ages. Bear driving simulators FTW!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Riveting
reviews.comment: Play a bear man, drive and get he food. Not a bear dude, dumbass.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Revolutionary
reviews.comment: This game transcends entertainment and demonstrates what bear-kind is truly capable of. The single handed control scheme express the feeling of triumph over all odds, and the graphics are an abstract masterpiece.  Easily the finest in bear driving.
reviews.author: Paul Olson

reviews.title: The best game ever, with no major flaw
reviews.comment: This game is incredibly fun, humorous, and even entrataining for onlookers. However this game\'s only shortcoming is a simple loose end in its conversion to the phone, if you accidently press back or any other button that would normally pause your game, this one quits and you have to start over :/
reviews.author: Isaac Litman

reviews.title: 10 out of 10 experience
reviews.comment: This has got to be the most genuine and realistic bear driving-simulator to date, featuring astounding graphics, excellent dialogue, lovable bears and a story that will have you talking about it for weeks, Enviro-Bear is in my top 3 best bear driving games to date and comes highly recommended.
reviews.author: Jayce Holland

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: But buggy on an HTC one x. Crashes and some of the scenery doesn\'t work right... Update please
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but has some issuses
reviews.comment: Love the game. But its too easy to accidentally quit out and of you do you lose any progress
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nothing else comes close.
reviews.comment: Without a doubt the best bear driving simulator ever created.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: None better
reviews.comment: There simply is no more precise, more accurate, or more finely tuned bear driving a Volkswagon Rabbit simulator in existence. All others are but poor clones and at the end of the day, Enviro-Bear 2010 reigns supreme.
reviews.author: Nels Benson

reviews.title: Best game ever
reviews.comment: This is the best game I have on my phone I love it I\'m going to buy all the games by this company!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of the finer games out there
reviews.comment: You will not find a game funnier than this. Ever.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love the PC edition. Mobile version is just as good. I just randomly decided to search this up and, not expecting to actually find it, found it for 99 cents! Thanks dev!
reviews.author: A Google User
